name: Unstable Asteroids
description:
There is an unstable nuclear reactor in space! For whatever reason, your goal is to protect the reactor from random asteroids. Beware that when the asteroids hit the reactor, they make it even less stable. Do not explode!

You can use asteroid dust to stabilize the reactor or to use its instability to explode the asteroids! (Obviously, asteroid dust helps you do that)

Controls:

 - WASD / Arrow keys to move

 - F to open/close shop menu

 - AD / Arrow keys to select an item in the shop

 - Space / Enter to purchase an item from the shop

Made using Rust programming language
